me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc.modifier

Class AnimationModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc.modifier.NPCModifier
      • me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc.modifier.AnimationModifier

  • public class AnimationModifier
extends NPCModifier
    A modifier for various animations a me.kapdor.rpjobs.api.npc can play.
